  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205294</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Women Impacting the Larger World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frauen, welche die größere Welt auswirken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Femmes effectuant le monde plus grand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mulheres que impactam o mundo maior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Donne che hanno effetto sul più grande mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναίκες που επηρεάζουν το μεγαλύτερο κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mujeres que afectan el mundo más grande</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The purpose of this lesson is to deepen students' understanding of the impact women have on society. Women's roles in this country and third-world countries are explored. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck dieser Lektion ist, Verständnis der 
Kursteilnehmer der Auswirkung Frauen zu vertiefen haben auf 
Gesellschaft. Rollen der Frauen in diesen Land- und 
Drittweltländern werden erforscht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de cette leçon est d'approfondir 
l'arrangement des étudiants des femmes d'impact ont sur la société.
Les rôles des femmes dans ces pays de pays et de 
troisième-monde sont explorés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade desta lição é aprofundar a 
compreensão dos estudantes das mulheres do impacto tem na sociedade. 
Os papéis das mulheres nestes países do país e do 
terceiro-mundo são explorados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di questa lezione è approfondire la 
comprensione degli allievi delle donne di effetto ha sulla società. 
I ruoli delle donne in questi paesi del terzo-mondo e del paese 
sono esplorati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός αυτού του μαθήματος είναι να εμβαθυθεί η 
κατανόηση των σπουδαστών των γυναικών αντίκτυπου έχει στην 
κοινωνία. Οι ρόλοι των γυναικών σε αυτήν την χώρα και τις 
τρίτος-παγκόσμιες χώρες εξερευνιούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito de esta lección es profundizar la 
comprensión de los estudiantes de las mujeres del impacto tiene en 
sociedad. Los papeles de las mujeres en estos países del país 
y del tercero-mundo se exploran.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
